thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-500.Com, China Sports Lottery Administration Enter Framework Agreement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-500.Com, China Sports Lottery Administration Enter Framework Agreement
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - 500.Com Ltd:
* 500.COM ENTERED INTO FRAMEWORK AGREEMENT WITH THE CHINA SPORTS LOTTERY ADMINISTRATION CENTER TO DEVELOP PHYSICAL SALES CHANNELS
* 500.COM LTD - ‍UNDER FRAMEWORK AGREEMENT, SPORTS LOTTERY CENTER WILL PROVIDE SUPPORT TO PROJECT​
* 500.COM LTD - CO, CHINA SPORTS LOTTERY ADMINISTRATION CENTER ENTERED INTO A FRAMEWORK AGREEMENT
* 500.COM LTD - WILL SEEK TO ENTER COOPERATION AGREEMENTS WITH PROVINCIAL SPORTS LOTTERIES CENTERS TO ASSIST IN INSTALLING SPORTS LOTTERY TERMINALS​
* 500.COM - DEAL UNDER WHICH CO, CHINA SPORTS LOTTERY ADMINISTRATION CENTER TO COOPERATE TO DEVELOP PHYSICAL CHANNELS TO SELL SPORTS LOTTERY TICKETS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
